text: (Napiyē!) Umatu maṉaivikaḷil nīr virumpiyavarkaḷai (virumpiya kālam varai) vilakki vaikkalām; nīr virumpiyavarkaḷai (virumpiya kālam varai) um'muṭaṉ irukka vaikkalām. Nīr vilakkiyavarkaḷil nīr virumpiyavarkaḷai um'muṭaṉ cērttuk koḷḷalām. (Ivaṟṟaip paṟṟi) um mītu oru kuṟṟamumillai. Avarkaḷuṭaiya kaṇkaḷ kuḷirntiruppataṟkum nīr avarkaḷukkuk koṭuttavaṟṟaip paṟṟi avarkaḷ aṉaivarumē tiruptiyaṭaintu kavalaippaṭātiruppataṟkum itu mikka culapamāṉa vaḻiyāka irukkiṟatu. Uṅkaḷ uḷḷaṅkaḷil uḷḷavaṟṟai allāh naṉkaṟivāṉ. Allāh (aṉaittaiyum) naṉkaṟintavaṉāka, poṟumaiyuṭaiyavaṉāka irukkiṟāṉ
